name: Wp App Studio

screenshots.caption: Create custom plugins in the form of WPAS apps.
Define your content using entities and entity attributes.
Create Twitter's Bootstrap or jQuery UI themed forms.
Use WPAS button to insert forms and views shortcodes in a post or page.
Use Font-Awesome webicon fonts in your radios, checkboxes and buttons.

summary: Wp App Studio is a Wordpress based custom plugin development platform.
short_description:
Wp App Studio (WPAS) is a cost-effective REST API based software as a service (SaaS) platform that creates fully featured WordPress apps(plugins). Saas is a software delivery model commonly used by companies such as Google, Yahoo, Amazon etc. In SaaS delivery model all processing takes place outside of your computer.

WPAS as a SaaS application does not require the deployment of a complex processing infrastructure and algorithms to generate code at your computer. It eliminates or drastically reduces the upfront commitment of resources at your end. WPAS also allows us to meet more complex and advanced requirements without being limited to any client computer profile.

Wp App Studio plugin is a development tool used to design and send app metadata to WPAS servers. After app (plugin) metadata is sent, WPAS Servers generate the code and send you a link to your plugin's zip file. No coding is necessary to design your own custom plugins.
